search_context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

results.title: Report a missed bin
results.snippet: If your street has been missed but isn't listed as a known disruption, you can report the missed collection using our online form below.

results.title: Tell us about it
results.snippet: Report something to us. This could be things such as child or adult abuse, missed bins, fly-tipping or potholes.

results.title: Report a spilled bin
results.snippet: Report a spilled bin if we've spilled any waste when we were emptying your bins.

Recommendations.Title: Report a missed bin
Key Strengths: Detailed instructions for reporting a missed bin collection.
Direct access to the required service.
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link provides a direct method to report a missed bin collection and seems to best fit the customer's information needs.

Recommendations.Title: Disruptions to bin collections
Key Strengths: Information about disruptions in bin collections.
Link to report a missed bin online.
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link provides information about current disruptions as well as the option to report a missed bin, which could be helpful for customers seeking updates on service status.

Recommendations.Title: Bins, rubbish and recycling
Recommendations.Reasoning: While this link does not directly address the specific need for council customer information about a missed bin, it provides an overview of related services which customers may find helpful.

Recommendations.Title: Order a bin
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link may be helpful for customers who are experiencing issues with their current bins and need to replace or order additional ones.

raw_result.Analysis Notes: The search results contained a mix of relevant and semi-relevant items related to council customer information needs about bin collections. Some links directly provided access to services for reporting missed or damaged bins, while others provided general overviews of available services.
raw_result.Recommendations Notes: While links 3 and 10 were not as directly relevant to the requested information, they still provide useful information that could assist customers in understanding and managing their bin services.
